Detailed Description

Allows accessing the editor configuration. This configuration file is mandatory for APOXI. The header file may not be changed or extended in any manner, it is only allowed to customize the implementation of the methods. If additional methods are needed for the MMI it is required to create a custom configuration file.

Member Function Documentation

static InputMapper* EditConfig::AllocInputMapper (  INT  input_mapper_id  )  [static]
 

Allocates a new instance of an InputMapper with the id input_mapper_id. If the input_mapper_id is not supported or the allocation has failed, 0 is returned.
